method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Cell.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Cell with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Cell with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Cell with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Cells within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Cell, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Cell, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Cell, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Cell, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Cell in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Cell in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Cell in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Cell with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Cell that follows the desired Cell.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Cell whose index follows the specified Cell in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Cell whose index comes before the desired Cell.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Cell in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Cell in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Cell.
Returns the Cell with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
